solution_line_template: If Emily adds {added_oranges} more oranges, there will be a total of {initial_apples} + {initial_oranges} + {added_oranges} = <<{initial_apples}+{initial_oranges}+{added_oranges}={total_fruits}>>{total_fruits} fruits in the basket.
So, the percentage of the fruit that is apples is {initial_apples}/{total_fruits} x {percentage_multiplier}% = {percentage_apples}%.
